I would definitely call this Asian sizing. Amazon suggested I order the small/medium, I got the large/extra large and could have gone up to an xxl.  Besides that it’s well made, I’m 5’9 and have a smaller chest. If I were even half a cup size bigger this would be too small. The hem of the dress did go to my ankles though so it’s long enough for sure.

The materials and embroidery are so beautiful. I wish this dress could fit me. From the shoulder straps to the waist line this dress is very short. I ordered a size up thinking is ran small. It doesn't. It was very wide, but the waist came up to my ribs even with the straps all the way extended. I have to return this though it hurts my heart.

I loves Sakkas dresses. The actual colors can be very inconsistent but you cannot go wrong with black. This dress is beautiful. I am 5’4” and 140 lbs and a 36C. I ordered the small/medium which came with a tag that said One Size Fits All. It fit fine. It is flat in the front with elastic in the back and ties to keep it fitted. It was a little too big but the ties made it look nice.  It came down to about my ankles at the longest part of the hem. This dress is beautiful and can be dressed up or down. I love this brand. Highly recommend.

One of the ties ripped off like 5 minutes after putting it on. All I did was sit down.. you’d think for the price it would be better than that. Luckily I have a sewing machine and I should be able to fix it pretty easily. But otherwise, it’s comfy and fits.

Well this dress fits just about perfectly! My one beef is the straps at the waist, they don't do too much to try and tighten, but it fit well enough as it was so I didn't need to adjust very much as it is. I am 5ft, 105lbs. It's just the right length even when I'm flat footed; it doesn't drag. I bought the red and to my please tell surprise, it wasn't fire truck red. It's a nice russet red. That was preferable for my needs! I'll definitely be getting another one of these! They're perfect if you're in Dagorhir like I am :) I reccomed this dress to anyone who is looking for one within this style and medieval time period! At my Dagorhir event, I got professional picture done. I don't have a good up and down but these at least show the color :)

This dress is very comfortable without sacrificing style. The smocking on the back of the bodice makes it very softly stretchy so the top follows and flatters without being at all binding. The smocking of the bodice ends just above the natural waist (unless you have a very short torso), which lets the skirt flow easily over the belly and hips. This hides anything you want hidden while still giving a VERY feminine silhouette.  The fabric is delightfully swishy, thick but light. Rayon has a such a nice drape to it! The down side of rayon is that it can be very fragile when wet, so be gentle with your wash routine.  I got the purple, and the color is very deep and rich.  I am 5'6" and the hem falls between midcalf and ankle on me. The bottom 6 inches or so is 2 graduated layers of fabric in the same color but differing decorative weaves, these layers are a bit sheer but low enough that you needn't worry about anything scandalous showing.  I typically wear a size 8, the regular "one size" fits me fine and I could see it fitting from a size 4 to a 16 or 18 easily.  The bodice does not offer much in the way of bust support but will hide an average bra. The shoulder straps are about 1/2 inch wide and very adjustable. The "hardware" on the straps is cheap plastic, which is a shame since the rest of the dress is so nice!

评论概述: everyone saying it ran small worried me but (no offense to anyone else when i say this) I feel like you have to be kind of wide
评论详情: I got this dress as part of a halloween costume but also wanted something i could wear year round too and i loooove it. everyone saying it ran small worried me but (no offense to anyone else when i say this) I feel like you have to be kind of wide in the mid section for it not to fit your body. im around 147 pounds and am 5'4 wear a 38 c bra and it fit me perfectly in my mid section, just had to lower the straps some. if you are a little bit pudgy in the mid section it has some stretch and gives enough were its comfortable but i can see too if you hold more weight there it would maybe be a tight fit. i loved how it made my waist line look and the length of it was long but not touching the ground long. such a pretty dress and great material doesnt feel like its cheaply made. you get your moneys worth!!

评论概述: Love it...with a little help from Sharpie!
评论详情: Pretty and comfortable! I'm small busted and it's snug enough in the top that I don't need a bra....but that means it might not fit as well for those who are more generously endowed. I had the same issue as some reviewers, where the waist tie-straps have a bit of white showing at the base, where they are sewn in. This is probably due to dying the dress after construction. I just took a purple Sharpie to the white spots, and voilå! It's perfect. :)
